title: Blacksmith
data:
The **blacksmith**, @, is a notable [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [NetHack: The Next Generation](/wiki/NetHack:_The_Next_Generation "NetHack: The Next Generation") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). In both variants, he is named **Duri** and tends to [The Forge](/wiki/The_Forge "The Forge"), where he will forge selected [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") weapons for the [hero](/wiki/Hero "Hero") at a suitably hefty price.

## Generation

Duri is the sole blacksmith generated in both variants. He is only found within The Forge, and is always generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful"); on level creation, he is placed in the open gap between the walls that separate both portions of his workshop.

## Description

[x][ ]

- NetHack: The Next Generation
- SlashTHEM

* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.

In NetHack: The Next Generation, Duri is on par with a [shopkeeper](/wiki/Shopkeeper "Shopkeeper") in terms of strength, though he lacks any [MR score](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)").

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [SlashTHEM 0.9.7 src/monst.c, line 4857](https://github.com/Soviet5lo/SlashTHEM/blob/v0.9.7/src/monst.c#L4857) |

In SlashTHEM, Duri has been buffed to roughly the power level of a [black marketeer](/wiki/Black_marketeer_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Black marketeer (SLASH'EM)").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) He generates with the powerful artifact [heavy hammer](/wiki/Heavy_hammer "Heavy hammer") [Warforger](/wiki/Warforger "Warforger"), and wears [silver dragon scale mail](/wiki/Silver_dragon_scale_mail "Silver dragon scale mail"), a [cloak of displacement](/wiki/Cloak_of_displacement "Cloak of displacement"), [speed boots](/wiki/Speed_boots "Speed boots"), and a [helm of brilliance](/wiki/Helm_of_brilliance "Helm of brilliance"); he also has an [amulet of life saving](/wiki/Amulet_of_life_saving "Amulet of life saving") and four potions of [full healing](/wiki/Potion_of_full_healing "Potion of full healing").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [SlashTHEM 0.9.7 src/monst.c, line 4858](https://github.com/Soviet5lo/SlashTHEM/blob/v0.9.7/src/monst.c#L4858)

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Blacksmith\&action=edit)*

html:
Blacksmith

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The blacksmith, @, is a notable monster that appears in NetHack: The Next Generation and SlashTHEM. In both variants, he is named Duri and tends to The Forge, where he will forge selected artifact weapons for the hero at a suitably hefty price.

Generation

Duri is the sole blacksmith generated in both variants. He is only found within The Forge, and is always generated peaceful; on level creation, he is placed in the open gap between the walls that separate both portions of his workshop.

Description

@ blacksmith File:Duri.png
Attacks Weapon 4d4, weapon 4d4
@ blacksmith File:Duri.png
Attacks

Weapon 4d4, weapon 4d4

Base level 12

Speed 18
Base AC 0
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances none
Resistances conveyed none

A blacksmith:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.

In NetHack: The Next Generation, Duri is on par with a shopkeeper in terms of strength, though he lacks any MR score.

@ blacksmith File:Duri.png
Attacks Weapon 4d10, weapon 4d10
@ blacksmith File:Duri.png
Attacks

Weapon 4d10, weapon 4d10

Base level 25

Speed 18
Base AC 0
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances none
Resistances conveyed none

A blacksmith:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
Reference SlashTHEM 0.9.7 src/monst.c, line 4857

In SlashTHEM, Duri has been buffed to roughly the power level of a black marketeer.[1] He generates with the powerful artifact heavy hammer Warforger, and wears silver dragon scale mail, a cloak of displacement, speed boots, and a helm of brilliance; he also has an amulet of life saving and four potions of full healing.

References

  1. ↑ SlashTHEM 0.9.7 src/monst.c, line 4858
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

rawPage:
The '''blacksmith''', {{white|@}}, is a notable [[monster]] that appears in [[NetHack: The Next Generation]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. In both variants, he is named '''Duri''' and tends to [[The Forge]], where he will forge selected [[artifact]] weapons for the [[hero]] at a suitably hefty price.

==Generation==
Duri is the sole blacksmith generated in both variants. He is only found within The Forge, and is always generated [[peaceful]]; on level creation, he is placed in the open gap between the walls that separate both portions of his workshop.

==Description==

In NetHack: The Next Generation, Duri is on par with a [[shopkeeper]] in terms of strength, though he lacks any [[magic resistance (monster)|MR score]].

In SlashTHEM, Duri has been buffed to roughly the power level of a [[Black marketeer (SLASH'EM)|black marketeer]].<ref>[https://github.com/Soviet5lo/SlashTHEM/blob/v0.9.7/src/monst.c#L4858 SlashTHEM 0.9.7 src/monst.c, line 4858]</ref> He generates with the powerful artifact [[heavy hammer]] [[Warforger]], and wears [[silver dragon scale mail]], a [[cloak of displacement]], [[speed boots]], and a [[helm of brilliance]]; he also has an [[amulet of life saving]] and four potions of {{! of|full healing}}.
</simpletabs>
